item.description:
Adult indoor Roller Skate / Roller Blading

Sunday Mar. 31th. 8 pm. to 12.
Chez-Vous
11 Rhoades st.
Dorchester Ma. 02124

Cost: $10.  Skate rental are available.
Carpooling from and along the way.  Starting in Nashua NH., at 7 pm. through Chelmsford, Woburn and Medford MA..         RSVPs are incorrect. This event is posted with 10 other Groups.
Host: Steve Ob1. 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net
Please join Steve Ob1. and friends for an evening of exercising, socializing and music. This is an indoor adult setting, no kids. This is a great place to learn, or improve your skating skills. Steve Ob1.is an instructor, and if asked, he will be happy to offer you some free help to get you started. Come and see skating in an all new way. The skaters at this rink are some of the best free dancer skaters, speed skaters and roller duby in N.E.. Steve carpools from Nashua at 7 pm. on down. The doors of the rink open at 8 pm. to midnight. But Steve Ob1 will not be there til around 8:30  Also, this is Steve Ob1.'s work out. So after he burns himself out. He will not make it much past 10:30. That usually puts us back in Nashua, NH around 11:30 pm..

Renting skate: Bring two pairs of socks, one thin, one thick.
item.how_to_find_us: Look 4 the Meetup sign on the table and on my skate bag.
item.name: Indoor Roller Skating / Roller Blading Boston
